" Now come here and face your punishment because i won't leave this room until i get you. So you have nowhere to go ! " She insisted. Maybe it was a chance for you, maybe you should accept your new life to make things easier. You tried your last chance to escape, and she couldn't be reasonned. What can you do ?

Daisy slammed the doors closed behind her, muttering under her breath something you couldn’t make out. She sighed contentedly as she settled to the floor and furiously tore off her high heels. She tossed them away from her and-oh.

You dove to the side as the heels landed and bounced to where you were standing moments ago. They were massive! If you had to guess your height based on these alone, you’d say you were around 1 inch tall now.

You pulled yourself off the floor, looking at the princess who had just thrown them. She was standing again, looking frustratedly at the door before her posture deflated and she sighed heavily.

She began pacing near the door, and you could practically see the gears of choice whirring in her head. As she decided you considered yourself, what to do?

You bobbed from foot to foot, trying to decide what to do next, but your options quickly dwindled as Daisy stood somewhat straighter, and began approaching her discarded shoes. From what you knew of Daisy, she was playful and nice. Past that... Nintendo had just gone with SPORT. Damnit.

What to do?

To either side of you were extremely soft, skin-toned orbs, holding you gently in place. That skin traveled up behind you, and it was around this time that you realized Daisy had simply dropped you down the collar of her dress.

Your face went red, and your ears burned. You couldn’t make out the rest of their conversation as your mind focused on your current situation.

They were so soft, plush even. Her skin was smooth, and warm. Very warm, in fact. You shifted slightly in discomfort. Definitely not feeling up the Princess’s heavenly mounds, nope. Not at all.

You knew she had stood when your entire world started bobbing with each step, your entire body feeling each of her steps. Another few minutes, and the bouncing slowed, a bit more light trickling into your prison as a pair of fingers reached in and plucked you from her cleavage.

Towards the far wall was a single table and chair, with a view out onto a balcony. In a corner, a divider sat next to a large wardrobe, a spare dress hanging over it.

Daisy looked back at you, and you back at her. “Well, I’m beat, to be honest with you.” Her posture sagged for a moment, but her expression was a bit more awake.

“Hows about we just wind down for the day?” You hadn’t had a chance to check the time of day, but looking out a large window, you could see that the sun had set some time ago.

What did she have in mind?

If it wasn't for the fit, it might as well have been an oversized t-shirt. In this case, it fit like a simple sundress, and was a bit tighter around her midriff while the base of the dress skimmed above her knees.

You waited as she approached, shooting a small smile your way. Clapping, she turned the lights in the room off, leaving only the lamp on her bedside and the moonlight filtering in through the windows of her room. You watched her climb into bed, somewhat in awe, as Daisy's size once again hit you. Her enormous body was far to graceful for her size, but it was quite a sight to watch her snuggle in under the covers, her head coming to a rest on the pillow next to yours.

She smiled over at you, her hair flowing messily around her head. "You've had a bit more of an... exciting day than I did..." She said, her expression somewhere between pained and guilty. It didn't stay long though, as she was soon giving you a smile again. "So, get some rest! I'll give you a tour in the morning."

She yawned, her warm breath and open mouth being an unintentional reminder of how your day was spent. Daisy didn't seem to notice, closing her mouth and blinking tiredly. She rolled over, turning off the lamp, leaving you only the faint light of the moon outside to see by.

"Good night." She muttered, settling in. The pillow you were on shifting as she did so. You followed suit, rolling over and closing your eyes. But, after trying for some time, you couldn't sleep... you were in a foreign setting, and quite a dangerous one for the size you were at. As comfortable as the pillow was, and as kind as Daisy had been, you were still rather on edge.

If you tried to, sleep would eventually come...

11411122311213.content:
Daisy stepped out from behind the changing barrier, stretched into a yawn, her eyes closed in relaxed effort. Yours, however, were wide open, staring at her. She had changed... into nothing. Her body was on full display. A pair of C-cup boobs stared at you, bouncing with her steps. Between her legs was a gap, giving you a shadowy glimpse of her most private of parts. Your face was grew very hot very quickly, and probably more red than a super mushroom. You couldn't tear your eyes off of her.

Daisy was clearly very athletic, with toned abs and a perceptible layer of muscle across her body. Her skin was tanned, leaving only her crotch and chest a pale white. She had clearly shaved or waxed recently, as you couldn't see a single loose hair, apart from what was on her head, anywhere on her body. Even as she stepped up to the bed, finishing up her stretch with one hand on her hip.

Of course, at this angle, you had a much better view of her, and lower lips. Her body towered up above you, the shadows across her body highlighting her muscled curvature. Lower, her labia wasn't exactly "in full bloom", but the twin lines of pinkish flesh still stood out to you.

You watched Daisy's eyes open, your heart thudding in your chest as her eyes locked onto you. A second passed. She froze up like a deer in the headlights, her face quickly turning a dark shade of red.

A few agonizing seconds passed, your eyes locked together. Daisy's mouth opened and closed a few times, apparently trying to find the right words. Her arm slowly lowered off her hip, rigid at her side. You were frozen as well, and your face was at least as red as hers was. You hoped she couldn't see how hard you were.

"I..." Daisy stammered, trying to formulate words. Her arms slowly rose up to cross her chest, almost defensively. This was enough embarrassment to get you to look away, spinning 180 degrees and sitting down on the pillow. You could hear her slowly and carefully sit down on the bed, the mattress and pillow you were on tilting slightly towards her massive body.

"I'm used to... ya'know... sleeping naked..." She managed to get out finally. "I didn't even... I didn't even think about what I was doing. Just running on reflexes." She finished.

You swallowed hard, unsure of what to say.

"O-okay." You said stupidly.

Neither of you moved until Daisy cleared her throat.

"Alright then!" She said, her embarrassed tone cracking through her faux bravado. "Let's get some sleep!"

Behind you, you heard and felt Daisy move, getting under the covers. A booming clap later and the room was dark. She fidgeted in the near-darkness of the room, now only lit by moonlight, as you slowly relaxed into a lying position. Not that you were actually relaxed, but you were doing your best considering the giant, nude, and hot princess laying next to you.

Another moment passed, an awkward silence in the air. Sure, you should both be sleeping, but you were fairly sure that she wouldn't be any more relaxed than you. Your assumptions proved correct as you heard her roll over, and you were able to look into her massive eyes on the next pillow over, looking at you apprehensively.

114111223112133.content:
Daisy’s eyes drifted off of you slightly, not looking you in the eyes. “I... I would like to make this less awkward...” she said, somewhat quietly. You sat up, giving her a curious glance. You were still quite not relaxed, but you were willing to hear her out.

She took your sitting up as a cue to continue. “Well... I hope it makes things better...” She took a breath before continuing, her breath warm and still sweet.

“We need to be more comfortable with each-other, so I figured I would...” She hesitated a moment before blushing harder, screwing her eyes shut.

“IfiguredIwouldletyousleeponmesomewheresowecouldgetcloser.Igetthatitswierd butIthinkitwouldhelpyouandmeoratleastmegetusedtohavingyouaroundImeanInormallysle epnakedanywaysoIwantittonotbethIsawkwardeverynightsoifwedothisitcouldhelpmegetus edtoyou.” She took another breath, and held it, her eyes still screwed shut.

You took a moment to comprehend what she said. You were blushing just as much as she was, but you had to agree with her. It made some sense. You nodded.

Then remembered she had her eyes closed. Taking a breath, you stood up and marched across the pillows, right up to the giant face of the princess, and set your hand on her cheek.

She jumped a little, her eyes opening. She stayed silent until you stepped back into her line of sight. You nodded, again.

The tension in her seemed to melt away, leaving just her massive blush behind. “Oh, good.” She breathed. “I was afraid you would refuse and then it would be even worse. I don’t think I’s be able to look you in the eye if you said no.”

She sighed, her eyes set on you once again, a small smile on her lips. “So, I was going to suggest you sleeping...”

Gathering up a bit of courage, you set your sights on the distant, but massive bed. Sticking off the end were two gigantic, webbed feet. The light snoring was barely audible over the soft trickle of the waterfall behind you, so you knew she was at least asleep.

After a few minutes of travel, you were rather winded. Your clothes were heavy with the water she’d splashed on you earlier, and it wasn’t easy to cross the somewhat rough floor in them. After only a moments hesitation you threw all but your underwear on the damp floor. Survival be damned, underwear is important, if only for decency. No longer held down, you continued.

It took you maybe 30 minutes altogether to reach the bed, and it was larger than you had previously thought. Stretching up at least 20 stories, and covered in a thick blue blanket, the bed was daunting to say the least. Further above you her feet stuck out, each as large as a decently sized house at your size.

Looking at the task ahead you, you steeled your nerves. You could DO this! You could get to the top!

Hand over hand, you pulled yourself up the blanket from the floor. It was plush, and surprisingly easy to grip. It still took you nearly 20 minutes to reach the top of the bed, chest heaving as you fell onto the comfortable blanket. A moments rest, then onward!

Next to you the fish lady continued to snore, now the sound was louder, but still gentle in your opinion. Her body lay flat against the bed, taller than some of the taller skyscrapers, at least 40 stories if you had to guess. She was front down, and you avoided looking at her raised butt for too long, though noticing that no blue scales were present.

She was still wet from her swim, her body glistening and the blanket on her bed damp. Her body gently rose and fell with each snore, and the rhythm seemed peaceful almost.

Now, to wake up the sleeping giantess.

114223311.content:
You lay on the ground for a moment longer before rising to your feet. You weren’t sure what guided you to choose this option, but you were ready, and kinda eager, to give it a shot.

Moving towards her legs, you carefully picked your way across the plush blue surface of the bed. As you got close to her shin the ground dipped down, thanks to the weight of the massive sea creature resting on the bed. You considered your options: either slide down and climb from the bottom, or run and jump onto her legs.

You took a few steps back as you prepared to jump. You were tired of climbing, to be honest, and the less you had to do, the better your life would be. With a grunt you threw yourself towards her leg, frantically scrambling for a handhold.

You were surprised to find that despite her scales, her legs were very difficult to get a grip on. Between the slight dampness that still clung to her and the smoother than expected texture of her scales, you barely kept yourself on her leg.

Grunting with effort, you pulled yourself up to the top of her leg, or the back you supposed. Catching your breath you took a moment to take in the leg you stood on.

A darker blue than her belly, but not too dark, and the scales criss crossed across her body, each no bigger then your own hand. If you were normal sized, you might not have even felt them with your fingers. Shockingly, you found yourself absentmindedly caressing her leg, but her distant snoring pulled you back to reality. You had a mission.

Standing up, you looked towards her head, but found it blocked by the low twin hills of her rear. Warmth invaded your face as you began walking along her leg. Just another obstacle, you muttered to yourself, trying to ignore some inner feelings on the manner.

You did find yourself slipping from time to time, her scales smooth and wet. They were not the best for walking, barefoot as you were. After a few minutes, you found yourself where her legs met, at the base of her butt.

Her scales did give way to skin; light blue, warm, and soft. You pulled your hand back quickly from her lower cheek, blushing profusely now, trying to look away from her rear. 1143312.content:
You found yourself surrounded by tall blades of grass that towered over you like trees. You have no clue how you got here or how you got so small in the first place; all you could remember was waking up from this very spot. You can't help, but feel like an insect in a place like this. "There's gotta be some place that I could survive in." You said, already thinking of finding shelter.

You don't even have to wander around this place because you soon found a large house nearby; you could seek protection within that structure. "Just like a bug, I bet I'll be safe in here than out here in the wild. Of course, I need to avoid getting spot by whoever lives there." You said.

You walked slowly to get a close look and realized that you need to find a way to get inside. The most obvious example is going through the door, but that's a little risky as someone could come out and unknowingly squish you. You spotted an open window next to the door so maybe you could climb your way inside. However, it'll probably take forever to get there and the owner could close it at anytime. Maybe you should look around the house a bit and see if there's some way to get in there.

What will you do?

You were so focused on the house that you found yourself bumping into the large hedge in front of you. Within the ticket, you can see a fence inside; this could lead to the backyard. You go through the vines and between the fences to get there.

Once you got there, you walk towards the yard to see that it was covered by a rather large garden with lots of plants and flowers plus a deck full of chairs and tables and a swimming pool. You admire the place for a bit before going back to your motive which was trying to get inside the house. Behind the house, you can see a glass door that you could slip and get inside, but there might be something else to get in quicker.

1143322112312.content:
Waking up never felt worse. A lingering pain in your temples caused you to groan from the very first moment your eyes opened.

You didn't get up, spending a minute or two trying to get the headache to leave, which it didn't, but at least it loosened its grip enough for you to sit upright and rub your head, letting out a hazy yawn.

Your brain began working properly again and you registered the fact you had been laying on a somewhat hard surface. You looked down... ground?

You were no longer in your house, but sitting on the ground among tall grass... very tall grass... something was wrong.

The grass around you was tall, too tall... taller than you!

"W-Wha...?"you stuttered, disoriented, trying to figure what happened. Around you, the grass forest spread endlessly, leaving you no clue of where you could be.

Without much choice, you got up, finding that you barely went past the blades of grass that formed your environment.

You could barely see past, but you swore you saw something different not too far in distance.

You immediately began a run towards it.

When you arrived, you discovered that you were standing on the shore of a gigantic lake. You looked down, staring at your own reflection in the water, judging that you were just a few inches tall.

No no no, this couldn't be real, this was a dream! It had to be!

You reached down and slid your hands in the cold water, splashing it in your face, but when you opened your eyes, nothing had changed.

This wasn't a dream.

Panic began penetrating your mind, spreading through your body, infiltrating your blood and breathing like a gust of freezing wind.

How did this happen? What was its meaning? And why was it happening?

All these questions were left unanswered, simply because you couldn't think of any motivation that could have caused this.

You kept looking at your image in the water, trying to recollect your thoughts.

You were in an unknown place, you were shrunken and you had no idea what to do. Nothing could have actually prepared you for this eventuality, just what happened to you!?

Panic caused you to start hyperventilating.

Unbeknownst to you, the sudden storm of emotions raging within you awakened something, something powerful, something that had been resting quietly under the surface of this lake up to this point.

You didn't immediately notice, but when water splashed in your face, you looked towards the lake and noticed the water shaking.

"What now?" you wondered aloud, stepping back.

You watched as a small 'hill' of water formed in the middle of the lake, just before something unbelievable happened: a small sphere that seemed to be made of water took off from the rest of the lake and hovered above it for a few moments, before it blew up, sending droplets of water flying around.

As if things hadn't been weird enough so far, you noted something even weirder, and it took the place of the water sphere: a creature was floating above the lake.

You watched in disbelief, you've never seen something like that. It had a relatively small body and small feet, long slender arms and a pink, oddly-shaped head. Also, it had two tails, each with a gem, and there was a third, red gem in the middle of its forehead. And... it was undeniably a her, you could judge because its reproductive organs were out for the world to see.

You watched as she began to... stir?

She threw she arms in the air and gave a yawn,

"MMeeeeees..."

You just stared at her, stunned by the mere existence of such creature, and wondered what it was.

However, it looked like she knew something was wrong, because it suddenly started looking around, her golden eyes scanning around carefully around, until they landed... right upon you.

For a moment, both you and the creature stared at each other; despite your size, it looked like she could see you clearly.

"Mesprit?" she moaned curiously,
"Mesprit!"

You watched at the titan flew down, right towards you; startled, you turned tail and attempted to run away, but before you could, a powerful, invisible force blocked your attempts to escape.

In an instant, you inexplicably began floating in the air, and flew straight into the creature's awaiting hand; you discovered her eyes glowing.

Immediately, you registered the expression she was staring at you with...

114332211233233333333333333331.content:
You woke up and got up from the ground, but why are you even sleeping in the ground instead of your bed is questionable. You soon got your answer when you opened your eyes and saw nothing but tall grass around you. Why is this? Why are you so small? Are you dreaming right now? You stood there and jump up and down a few times to wake yourself up, but it wasn't working as this was all too real.

That isn't the only thing you noticed strange, but the fact that you were in a middle of nowhere. You don't know where ever you are but it sure is hot and humid around here. You don't want stay here and sweat like crazy, you should find a cool spot around here.

Fortunately, it didn't take you long enough to find something better than a cool spot: a large building that was just close to where you are. This building was large; even at normal height. It was completely white plus it looks highly advanced and futuristic. You don't know who lives here, but your mind was immediately made up and decided to go there to get some cool air. You made way out of the grass blades and onto the dirty path, walking to the giant structure. You come across a series of giant steps and realized that you need to climb up to get there but sadly, the steps were too smooth to climb over which it's impossible to get inside. Crap, now you're forced to stand there as the bright sun heats you up and burns your skin down.

Suddenly, you hear a noise coming the building and you look up to see that someone is coming out. You back away for a bit to see who this giant is.

It is a young girl with short purple hair that was tied up by a golden hairpin and wide grin. She wears what looks like a purple and blue dress that was made of rags and stitches and a pair of lavender sandals. The giant girl looked kinda cute, but she also look a little strange too; almost like a nonhuman being. You watch as she walks down the steps until her sandals now lands next to you.

You stare at her giant feet and you don't know why, but you were beginning to get a little fixated at them. You watch as her toes wiggle a bit and shifts her feet around in the sandals; you could see some sight sweat sliding down. This strange little girl have some adorable feet plus it looks like you could get cool from the heat on them. Without hesitation, you make your way and make a leap towards them.

You successfully grab onto her foot and (despite being covered in sweat) made you way on top of it. You rub yourself on the foot until you got wet from it's sweat; now you were getting cooler. With you being on top of the foot, you were slowly getting a bit attracted to it; maybe you could play with her feet later.

What happens next?

1143322112332333333333333333311.content:
As you steadied yourself on the giant girl's toe she started walking again from her brief pause. It seems, however, that this walk could hardly be considered a walk, more like a short trip to a destination 2 meters away, that destination being a sun chair purely made of wood, firmly planted into the ground. The sun chair also has a foldable umbrella, probably to make shade if the sun becomes too much.

Within a moment your ride comes to a halt as the girl sits down and flings her feet up. With very little control over your situation, you fly dozens of meters off the ground and start to see your life flash before your eyes.

Of course, the moment you landed you expected to explode but surprisingly... it didn't happen? More accurately, you just stopped. No pain, no impact noise, nothing. You stood up and felt nothing wrong with your body. Did, perhaps, whatever shrink you also make you immune to pain or damage? If so, there was much less incentive to get help and much more incentive to be a little perv.

With this thought in mind, you return to the lounging girl who just before swung her legs upon sitting down like a child was now lying down peacefully as if she didn't almost send you to your death. Nevermind that, you happened to land quite close.

You approach the feet that had once terrified you so and non-hesitantly approached them, knowledge of your new-found durability boosting your confidence. The thing is, how to have fun with her?

11433222222112.content:
Of course, anyone noticing a tiny person calling their name from right in front of their house would wear the expression Shantae had now.

However, as she stared down at you in silence, you noted that a friendly smile was starting to crawl across her face.

"Hello there." she spoke, taking a step towards you. You could swear the whole dock was shaking underneath you as Shantae walked all the way back to the barrel that served as your hiding spot shortly ago, towering above you.

You were impressed by her size alone.

You watched the titaness suddenly becoming shorter as she knelt down and extended a hand towards you. The motion wasn't exactly slow, and you instinctively jumped back, avoiding ending up in the excited half-genie's hand, which ended up grasping the air.

You really didn't want to do that, but your body was faster than your mind.

Shantae pouted for a moment, then spoke soothing,

"Don't be scared, little guy, I'm not going to hurt you. Here," she said, once more bringing her hand to you, only in a much slower fashion and, instead of going for the grab, she stopped with her palm up at a short distance from you.

She wanted you to climb on.

Her words and her reassuring smile were enough to convince you, and you stepped onto her hand.

"Here we go." the half-genie giantess said, bringing her hand to her face while standing back onto her feet; the moment she did, her palm shook as you traveled far up into the air. A fall from here would probably be lethal for someone your current size.

"So, who are you? How did you get so small? Wait..." she interrupted before you could even talk; she looked around,
"Hmm... maybe this is not the best place to talk."

You too looked around. Thinking about it, you were out in the open, and if anyone came up to Shantae right now, friend or foe, you doubted they'd expect seeing her talking to a small person.

"... Agreed." you spoke for the first time she the half-genie laid eyes on you.

"Right." she said, before adopting another smile,
"Well, let's go!... Home!"

"No wai-" you couldn't even finish as her hand closed in a fist, trapping you from the waist down; without giving you any time to protest about her hasty behavior, Shantae quickly turned around and sprinted towards a lighthouse at the end of the dock.

Her home.

--

After a short, though dizzying ride, you found yourself being placed down onto a stool.

You shook your head to rid it from the invading sense of nausea you were feeling while the giant half-genie knelt down before the stool, placing her hands on the floor so she was standing at eye level with you, more or less.

"So, I was saying, how did you get so small?" she asked, her voice loud enough to make your ears ring.

She had to wait for a few moments, because you were still in the middle of recovery from the ride she gave you; once you didn't feel like throwing up anymore, you forcefully swallowed a lump in your throat.

"Hmm... want some water?" Shantae offered, but you shook a finger, silently telling that you were fine.

"I..." you began speaking,
"I don't know how I got this small. I just... kind of woke up, and I was like this." you tried to explain, even though you couldn't quite figure this out yourself.

"That sounds odd." Shantae commented.

"It is." you agreed, though not mentioning it was even weirder that you found yourself stranded in a video game. From the outfit she was wearing, you could tell you must have ended in 'Half-Genie Hero'; you wondered if the events occurring in the game have happened already.

Shantae pondered another question. It didn't look like it to her, but she still felt the need to ask,

"What were you doing in front of my house? I mean, I don't think you were trying to attack me." she said, wearing a smile,
"You're too small to be a bad guy!"

Jeez, for a hero, she had all the finesse of the stool you were on.

"... I have no idea why I was in front of your house, either." you told her.

"But... you were hiding..."

"Try to see things my way, everything is just gigantic." you replied,
"I woke up in front of your house and decided to hide and wait. Then, you came out." you explained.

Shantae appeared to be thinking. Then, after a few moments, she looked back at you with a sweeter smile.

"Um... that sounds plausible. Everything must look scary from your point of view." she emphatically said.

"Well... not as scary as you're thinking." you replied,
"But still, everything's pretty big so... yeah, it's a bit intimidating."

Shantae giggled.

"... Anyway, I still need help! Can you do that? I mean... you're a hero!" you praised, letting the fan side of you take over for a moment,
"You saved this place so many times a-and it was amazing every time!"

"Aw, thank you." she said, gently moving a hand to pick you from your wooden perch, giving a warm smile in response to your praising,
"And, sure, I can no doubt do something for you! I think I know what to do..."

"You do?"

Shantae nodded.

"Yeah! I mean, you're not a bad guy, so you came to the right half-genie!... Well, actually, I did kind of walk to you... anyway, it's easy! I just have to..."
11433222222112.title: A friendly face

choices: "Let's go: a trip into town is sure to cheer you up!"
"Let's get to know to each other, you'll warm up to me in no time!"
114332222221122.content:
Your heart skipped a beat at the mention, then it began beating a little faster. Still, you tried to convince yourself you heard wrong.

"E-Excuse me, what was that you said?" you asked the half-genie giantess, who wore a concerned expression - her voice must have felt like a thunderstorm in your tiny ears.

"I said," she spoke, lowering her voice,
"I just have to keep you. That way, you can be safe!" she explained, though letting her voice get louder again.

She covered her mouth with her hands and giggled as she noted your expression,
"Sorry." she apologized, thinking that your face was a result of her voice pounding your eardrums.

In reality, it was not at all.

"K... Keep me?" you mouthed, feeling a huge weight on your chest.

It was true you admired the half-genie, but her keeping you? You weren't even sure what that would imply!

"But, Shantae!" you complained,
"I need to get back to my size! I can't stay like this! You've got to help me!"

In response, Shantae waved a hand dejectedly.

"I would help you," she began explaining,
"Things is, I don't know how I could. I've never created any size-related dances, and I'm afraid I might mess up if I try. That aside, there would be my Uncle Mimic, but I'm not sure he's got anything that can help you. I don't know of any artifacts of the Old World he's found that can shrink/grow people." she said, before regaining a smile,
"Trust me, it's better if I keep you. You'll be safe and sound that way!"

"H-Hey!" you exclaimed in protest,
"You can't 'keep' me!"

Shantae pulled back.

"Hmm?" she said,
"Why?"

You didn't immediately reply, but pondered your next words carefully. You didn't want to risk to offend the half-genie, who notoriously had quite the temper.

"Um..." you hesitated,
"When you say you're going to keep me... what do you mean?"

Shantae cocked her head, perplexed.

"I don't... I don't follow." she admitted, placing her hands on her knees as she stared you down,
"What do you mean by that?"

You inhaled deeply.

"Would I be... like a pet or something?" you asked.

Shantae understood this time, and was quick to reply,

"Oh, no. No no no, you've got it all wrong!" she exclaimed, shaking her hands and head. Then, with a smile, she reassured,
"I was thinking more like a roommate. Y'know, I can keep you safe, fed and so on. You'll be fine."

"... That sounds good," you admitted, before formulating a secondary concern you had; you had to pick the right words again,
"... But what about Risky Boots? If she attacks..." you didn't finish that sentence.

Shantae's smiling face turned into a frown - she hadn't thought of Risky during this whole conversation.

Now that you were mentioning it though...

"... Don't worry, small one," she said, picking you in hand and shooting a reassuring smile,
"I won't let her get her hands on you! In fact, I won't let any of my enemies get their hands on you!"

The statement alone and Shantae's determined face made it hard to not believe her words.

So, seeing as you really didn't have any other choice, you had to agree and accept the fact she was keeping you.

"Alright, then." you said, sighing,
"I guess I'm in."

Shantae smiled massively.

"I promise you won't regret this." she declared, rising to her full height; sitting on her palm at such height was impressive and you tried not to think about it.

"Yeah..." you murmured,
"Thanks, Shantae..."

After that, you fell silent, wanting to think to yourself.

Alas, the half-genie could tell something was wrong with you and, after a few minutes of just staring, she asked,

"Hey, are you alright? You sorta zoned out..."

You sighed.

"This is... it's a bit much to take in." you admitted after doing some thinking,
"But don't worry, I'll be fine."

Shantae didn't look too pleased with your answer.

"No." the purple-haired giantess said,
"If you're gonna stay here, I can't have you sulking all the time. I've got to help you, and that means I have to cheer you up!"

"Shantae, there's no n-"

"And I think I know how to do just that!" she happily declared, interrupting you, before looking at you with a grin.

12411.content:
Your head was pounding.

That was all you could really think of. The pain was emanating from somewhere behind your eyes, pulsing mercilessly through your skull. You tossed and turned. Your bed didn't comfort you much. In fact, you felt as if you were lying on something much harder. Wood, stone, or mabye even metal.

Through the haze clouding your mind, you desperately searched for an explanation for your condition. But nothing you thougth of could explain the pain. It wasn't a hangover - you were much to busy to get smashed on a wednesday. And you hadn't been sick in ages. No meds, no drugs, there was nothing you had taken that could have such an effect.

The headache got even stronger. Blurry images formed infront of your eyes. A place appeared... one that you had never seen before. An enormous city, made of steel, huge spires of metal piercing the sky, flooded in ugly neon lights. Below, tight and crowded streets. It was a metropolis, for sure.
But then, somehow, your view of the strange city changed. You slowly descended, towards the streets and then underneath. When you could see again, you saw another city. But this one was much cruder and disheveled. Houses were built out of discarded metal plates. A slew of people rushed through narrow paths, scurrying from place to place. Many unsavoury faces were hanging around, giving you an uneasy feeling.

Then suddenly, your vision went dark - and the pain subsided. With a start, you got up.
The first thing you noticed was the lack of light. All around you was nothing but pitch blackness. Not even a window. The second thing was the hardness of the floor. Had you fallen out of your bed? You reached around, trying to get a hold of anything - to no avail.

As you struggled to get on your feet, your eyes slowly adjusted to the darkness. Not that you could see anything more. Wherever you were seemed to be completely devoid of furniture. The walls were completely blank. You reached out your hand and touched the surface. Metal.

You stumbled forward. The room was narrow, but long. All you could do was to walk into one direction and hope to find any way of finding out, where you were.
Fortunately, you didn't have to wait long. A small glimmer of light appeared at the end of this metal tunnel. Finally you could get some bearing on your surroundings. With a light jog, you reached the exit.

And stopped dead in your tracks.
The room before you looked absolutely alien to you, for two reasons. First of all, you didn't know any place like this. The furniture and architecture was completely different to what you were used to.
Not that that mattered much. A much greater reason for your bafflement was the simple fact that everything in this room was HUGE! You could barely make out the ceiling of the gigantic room, simple items towered over you. Wherever you were - you were very small. Two inches at best.

With your mind reeling, you hadn't even been able to really take in the room. After a while you noticed, you were standing in a...
12411.title: Waking up in a strange world

choices: Climb the counter to get Tifa's attention!
Tickle her foot - and risk getting crushed under Tifa's boots!
Make a mess - and risk Tifa's anger!
124112.content:
The high stools, the long wooden tables, a pinball machine leaned against the wall. You were in a bar, all right.
Though not a very successful one. Absolutely no one was in. You would have thought that the establishment was closed were it not for the extremely bored looking woman behind the counter.

You froze as you saw her. The woman absolutely towered over you, rising above you like a skyscraper. You were barely even the size of her ankle! Your breathing stopped as you took in her nearly incomprehensible size.
But on top of that there was another reason for your transfixion.

The giantess was gorgeous, in every possible way. Long, black hair flowed down her back, unkempt but soft. It reached down all the way to her behind, which was clad in a daringly short leather skirt. It's only security were the two large suspenders snaking up her sides and over her shoulders. The two large straps were pushed aside though by an - and you couldn't help but blush - absolutely massive chest, covered by a very tight and very short, white tank top. It didn't even reach down to her belly, simply cutting off right below her cleavage. Even from down here, you could see just how much larger a single one of her breasts was than you.
You swallowed, hard. A strange feeling arose in your stomach. You wouldn't have minded visiting a strange place like this, but your minuscule size made this completely terrifying. Every instinct in your body screamed at you to seek cover and hide. But you also knew you couldn't survive on your own. Help from a giant was the most important thing right now if you wanted to survive.

The fact that the only person you could see was an absolute bombshell certainly influenced your decision. Someone this beautiful couldn't be evil, right?
At least you tried rationalizing it. But as you approached the gargantuan women, your fear of her grew just as much as your admiration. As you finally came around the counter, you were confronted with her enormous red boots. She was crossing her legs, leaning on one foot while tapping the ground impatiently with the other. You flinched as the image of you crushed beneath those boots entered your mind.
With a shake of your head, you banished the thought. You needed help. Now the only thing you had to do was to figure out a way to contact this gorgeous giantess.

Climbing the counter she was leaning against was an option. The surface was everything but smooth, worn down with the years. Ridges and dents scarred the surface, which would make perfect footholds. The only thing worrying you was, just how tall the counter was. It would be a long way to climb.

There was another opportunity, however. The giantess' boots weren't in the best condition, and you could spy a small hole in one of them. Still, it was large enough to crawl into. You knew from experience just how sensitive feet could be. If you were lucky, all it would take was a single poke for the giantess to notice you. Of course, this would be incredibly dangerous. If she so much as shifted her weigh, you might end as a splatter on her floor.

The final option was to make enough noise for her to notice you. Looking around, you could see some large glass bottles, full with a dark brown liquid, probably whiskey, collecting dust in the corner. If you tipped those over, the giantess would surely notice. You could only hope that she would understand you making a mess to get her attention.
124112.title: Gigantic barmaid Tifa Lockheart

choices: Climb your way up to Tifa's face!
Poke Tifa's breasts - surely she will notice you then!
Suddenly, Tifa rises - and starts cleaning the counter!
1241121.content:
Climbing was surely, if not the easiest, the safest option. Getting the only person capable of helping you, especially a giantess like this, angry at you was not something you wanted to experience. Ending up underfoot was also something you'd rather avoid. You walked up to the counter. The enormous woman continued to stay at her place. You could only hope that she would remain there until you had finished your climb, or your effort would be in vain.

Grabbing onto the first of many dents, you pushed your way upwards. The climb was long and uneventful, except for the small melody, the giantess began to whistle half-way through. But she kept standing behind the counter until finally, as you crawled over the edge, you could get a good look at her.

The woman was slouched over, propping herself up with her elbows resting on the counter. Her face was framed by her hands, which were covered by thick, fingerless gloves. With worry you noticed the steel plates covering the knuckles. She was carrying a bored expression, and kept changing up her whistle. Her eyes were large and a warm brown, her lips full and pale.
Your eyes wandered lower and once again, you were met by her absolutely gargantuan chest. Warmth shot on to your cheeks. You couldn't help but stare. Her tank top wasn't doing a very good job of hiding her form, quite the opposite. It hugged every single curve of her body. Because of her pose, you got a good look at her cleavage as well.
Quickly, you averted your eyes. You were in a strange world and only a fraction of your size, but getting aroused by a woman capable of snuffing out your meager existence with a single fingertip might have been the most absurd thing yet.

As you struggled to look anywhere but the enormous breasts in front of you, your eyes wandered even lower. You were stunned, when you saw the woman's exposed stomach. You hadn't noticed just how muscular this woman was. There was no ounce of fat, just large and well defined abs. Looking up, you saw that her biceps was just as large.
Somehow, the woman had become even more intimidating. The thought that it wouldn't even take her the slightest effort to wipe you out entered your mind and suddenly you regretted not running as far away from this giantess as you could.

But you were here now. And even though you were scared, the rational part of your brain told you that you had to ask her for help. She may be gigantic, but she looked like a normal human. And though she was intimidating, surely she would help a person in need. You needed to get her attention.

The only question was, how?
1241121.title: Getting closer to Tifa

choices: Tifa turns her eyes - and notices you!
Tifa swirls around, surprised. You slip and fall - right into her top!
Tifa... doesn't notice you. Do you have to get even closer?
12411211.content:
Sucking in your breath and trying to ignore the creeping panic swelling up inside you, you slowly wandered forwards. The giantess sadly wasn't looking at the counter. Her head in her hands, she instead stared into the empty bar, whistling a soft melody. There was no other way to get her to notice you - you had to climb her.
As you got closer to her right elbow, you swallowed. Was this a good idea? Her biceps alone was larger than you! One wrong movement, and the gigantic muscle would turn you into paste!
Swallowing your fear, you continued. Hopeful, you poked her arm, but you didn't even make a dent in her skin. A punch with all your might got you the same result, only that your hand now hurt as well. With a sigh, you accepted your fate. You simply weren't strong enough to get her to feel you, which made your journey to her face unavoidable.

You pushed your hands right into the gap where her lower arm met her biceps. Her skin was firm and unyielding. Perfect for you to climb her. Digging your fingers into her flesh, you pulled yourself upward and with a skip, landed on her enormous muscle.
It would be a steep climb from here on. She was leaning on her elbows after all, and so her upper arm was almost a vertical wall in front of you. But there was hope: a thick strand of hair had escaped the rest and was dangling right below her shoulder. If you could get up there you could hold on to it, making the rest of the way much easier.

You began your climb and soon, you encountered another enemy - the heat. The bar wasn't exactly well ventilated, and so a thin layer of sweat was covering the arms of the gargantuan woman. More than once, you almost slipped. Which might not have been so bad, a small voice in the back of your had said. After all, if you fell now, there was only one place you would end up: right in the woman's top.
Of course, you couldn't pay that voice any mind. As enticing as it sounded, you hadn't planned on ending your life by diving into a titan sized cleavage.

Then, finally, you grabbed a hold of the thick strand of hair. Quickly, you entangled your hands as much as you could into it, forming an all natural safety knot. Now, you could simply climb your way up.
You followed the hair until you were at eye level with the giantess. It was now or never. Your only chance. You opened your mouth...

"HELP! Down here, Miss, please help me!"
12411211.title: Scaling Tifa

124112111.content:
The gigantic barmaid’s whistling came to a sudden halt as she swore she heard a tiny noise. Could it have been a bug? ...no, it didn’t sound quite like an insect to her. It sounded more like...a language she understood! And extremely close to her eye was...

“EEK!!”

You felt like that shriek was going to deafen your puny ears, but miraculously it didn’t. As she continued to stare at your shrunken form clinging to her hair, Tifa was in utter disbelief. It took her a good minute to find her words.

“Are you...a tiny human?” Tifa finally asked, still not sure what to make of this situation.

You nodded “yes” to her and told her your name, before explaining how you ended up in this bar at your current size. Tifa carefully untied you from her hair and allowed you to stand atop her open palm. This was so otherworldly - it wasn’t every day she encountered a tiny person. In fact, this might have been her FIRST encounter with a tiny person!

As Tifa began to make sense of your tale, her initial wide-eyed gaze of shock gradually transitioned into...
124112111.title: Noticed by Tifa

choices: "... I make you a little house!"
1241121111.content:
As you recounted Tifa your arrival in this world and your perilous journey to make contact with her, her stunned expression slowly faded, replaced by a soft smile.
"I can't believe you thought about tickling my feet to contact me!" She half laughed, half shouted, "And I'm so glad, you didn't. I'm kinda sensitive down there, so... well, lets not dwell on that." She looked won at her boots. "But its good to know I've got a hole in them. Thanks for that, I'll fix it soon."

"Has anything like this ever happened?" You asked, trying to get the titanic barmaid back on track. "A tiny person appearing in your bar?"
"No, this is definitely the first time! Haven't heard of something like this, either. Hey, cheer up!" Tifa said as she saw your expression fall. "Whatever magic brought you here, there must be a way to reverse it, right? Why don't you try casting the spell again?"
You looked up at her, puzzled. "Spell?"
Tifa's expression changed once more, this time to worry. "Don't tell me... you can't use magic?"
You shook your head.
"Okay... that changes everything. I just thought this was a funny mishap, you know? But if you can't use magic, then I don't even know where to begin."
"isn't there anyone who would? Maybe a mage or something... I don't know. Someone who knows about this kinda stuff!" You yelled in frustration.
"Well, its not that easy. For a start, I don't know anyone like this, and even if I did, the materia to pull a stunt like this is way above my pay grade. Hell, I barely manage to keep this hole running. I can't spend money on a fancy spell."

You broke down, falling to your knees on the gigantic bar counter. You had thought that simply making contact would be enough to solve this problem. But even the giantess, a native to this world, had no idea how to help you. Reality came crashing in. You were stuck here - and at a minuscule size at that.
"Hey, don't sulk!" Tifa let her finger softly brush against your head. Was she... petting you? "I know its scary, but at least your safe with me. You can stay here for as long as you like, little girl." She laughed. "After all, taking care of you should barely cost me anything. And hey, maybe I can find somebody who knows enough magic to send you back."
Hope rose in your chest and you looked up. Tifa's face hovered above you, a warm and kind smile on her lips. At least you weren't alone.

"But hey, lets not just stand around here. I think you really deserve something nice to calm you down." Tifa put a finger to her chin. "How about..."
1241121111.title: Tifa, the friendly giantess

choices: "... I've got something stuck in my teeth, so get in there and clean them!"
"... I've got a whole in my boot. Go down there and patch it!"
"... My skirt isn't sitting right. Go down there and fix it!"
1241121112.content:
"... So, you're from a different world, then?" Tifa asked. You nodded fervently, glad that you had finally made contact. Maybe now, you could figure out what happened, and, more importantly, how you could return to your own world.
Tifa's gaze, however, had taken on quite the odd look. Her initial concern had gradually faded from her eyes, an amused smile taking its place in stead.

You only noticed the way she was looking at you when you stopped with your explanation. Something about it rubbed you the wrong way...
"Which also means that no one knows you're here, right?" The giantess asked again.
You didn't like the question. It felt not only weird, but her eyes had taken on an almost predatory gleam. Without you noticing, she was slowly inching closer to you. Soon, her enormous face felt your entire field of vision.
"Yeah... which is why I need your help!" you yelled up towards her. Suddenly, the relief you had felt when Tifa had noticed you faded. Being this close to her, you realized just how vulnerable you really were. Had this really been a good idea?

"Hmm, I don't know if I can help you, little girl... I'm not really a mage and the materia I have isn't really suited to this kind of problem."
Materia? Mage? What was she saying?
"Is there... Magic in this world?" you asked, completely thrown for a loop.
Tifa only raised an eyebrow. "What, there's none in yours? I thought you ended up here because of some magical mishap."
You shook your head. "There is no such thing in my world! But if there is in yours, maybe there is someone who could help me? Could you bring me to one of these mages?"

Tifa snorted, the wind blowing out of her nose knocking you on to your butt.
"Oh, I can't afford that. This place doesn't get very busy, so getting all the way up to the upper city would be pretty hard. Besides, the Shinra keep a tight leash on anything that powerful. And you don't want them getting their hands on you. They'd sooner give you to one of their weird scientists to dissect, then actually help you."
A shiver ran down your spine. That was the last thing you wanted.
"So, you're gonna stay with me for the time being, little girl... I promise you, it'll be fun." Suddenly, she brought you almost directly to her mouth. Her voice dropped to a whisper.

"At least for one of us..."

You reeled backwards. The way she said that, the way she was looking at you - suddenly, it all made sense.
"What do you mean by that? You've gotta help me!" you yelled, though you couldn't mask the begging tone in your voice.
"Well, I can't help you return to your world, so I'm gonna take care of you," Tifa smirked, "but I can't exactly take care of you for free. And if you haven't noticed: this world isn't exactly the best. A lot is going wrong, and quite frankly, it's stressing me out."

She looked you up and down. You shivered under her hungry gaze.

"But now I have you to take care of that... and if you want to stay here, you better make yourself useful and listen to me. You won't like it out there. Now, for your first task..."
1241121112.title: Tifa's new plaything

1243.content: Which video games do you end up?

choices: A Spell for Chameleon by Piers Anthony
Magic Kingdom for Sale - Sold! by Terry Brooks
125.content:
"The plays the thing," Shakespeare had Hamlet say, but you're just not sure.

You're name is Danielle Habley, great-great-great-granddaughter of the Joshua Habley who founded Hableyville, and the granddaughter of Robert Hableyville, the man who is currently CEO of Habley Corps. Habley Corps can trace its roots back to a company that developed mining techniques for adventurers and entrepreneurs heading west. Now, it's one of the hottest tech stocks on the market, with an electronics R&D lab that rivals anybody.

And as his eighteen year old granddaughter, a lot of weight is put on your shoulders to live up to the Habley name. It's not enough that you are a star athlete, a star student, and a gorgeous brunette as well. You're expected to be involved in all the social events that the Habley family has always run.

Such as the annual charity event for the Habley Town Library. As can be expected, the event always has a literary event, and for the last five years, it's always been a play of some sort. Last year it was Rostand's Cyrano.

For some reason, your grandmother has decided to give the decision to pick a theme for this year's event to you. She says she wants to pick something "literary, but young and fresh."

You're fairly sure you're going to screw it up.

With an overly dramatic sigh, you look at the four books you've narrowed it down to, and decide which one you're going to pick, not realizing what a profound effect your choice is going to have on you personally in the coming days. You decide to go with

1254.title: Question

info.brief_description: You woke up in a random fictional world....but with a twist!
info.description:
You gets shrunken and ends up in a random world based on various popular media. However unlike many similar stories like this, you don't meet up with a character at the very beginning instead you end up at a certain location spot and which character you meet will be up to the reader themselves to decide.

Rules:

1. Each chapters must be a paragraph and have some effort put into it.

2. No character choices. You must choose a specific location to start the story and which character you meet up will be up to you.

3. Use decent grammar.

4. Any fetish is allowed as long as they're involved alongside with the main theme of the story.

5. The protagonist can have any type of personality he/she could have.

6. Don't end the story so quickly.

7. Deaths are okay, but put some effort into them.

8. Unlike my other stories, this one not always be focused on survival but any type of situation you could think up.

9. Have fun!


11/22/2017 update:

Thank you SuperKirby2, Lover of all giantesses, revan92, Mr. Phorcys, 152, and everyone else for all the chapters you have added so far. With now over 100 chapters and 2000 views, I never knew my story could end up becoming so popular with the help of each of your support. Once again, thank you very much!

Here are some bit of advices on those who wanted to make an addition:

-Don't be afraid of adding a character that's already been added before. Remember you are only adding locations not characters, For example, if you want to make story about encountering Princess Zelda in a location even though someone else already did that in another, then go right ahead. No separate chapters are connected to each other so write at your own pace if you want.

-You don't have to add a well-known location like Peach's castle or Konohagakure, you can just add a random spot like in the middle of an open field or heck even on/in a character's body.

I encourage you guys to keep up the good work as always and don't worry about me, I'll try my best to add as well. At the meantime, make sure to check out my other stories as they too need some love as well.

Have fun!




06/21/2019 UPDATE:

As of this time, the story's rating has now jumped from 13+ to 18+ giving everyone the freedom to write whatever fits their style whatever they want. Any chapters with violent, sexual or other contents that are common in older rated stories are accepted without consequences.

However, there's still a few limits that you must follow. Just because you can write whatever you want does not mean there's no rules.

New Rules:

1. No extreme sexual content with underage characters.

It's so damn obvious why stuff like this should never be in the story. I don't want to see a story involving NSFW material with young characters because it's seriously messed up. So please don't go too far with this sort of stuff with the chapter involve around them.

2. No rebirthing.

I can still tolerate Insertion stuff....even if that's not my cup of tea. However, I can't really make sense with rebirthing stuff (I mean how can't you be turn into a newborn just by going inside reproductive organs) so I'm afraid this sort of stuff aren't allowed. My apologizes to all you fans out there.

3. Toilet stuff

While I'm fine with some bodily functions like sweat, boogers, and so on. However, I'm not okay with pooping, peeing and other stuff that is commonly seen on the toilet. Seriously, I'm terribly grossed out by this sort of stuff. Of course, that doesn't mean everyone can't do their business as long it happens off-screen.


So there you have it guys, go extra nuts and write what's ever in your mind ;)
